name: tweego-setup
description: A basic project setup for Tweego with all the trimmings using Node.

scripts.build: gulp build && tweego -f $npm_package_config_format --head=src/HEAD.html -o dist/index.html project && opn dist/index.html
scripts.testmode: gulp build && tweego -f $npm_package_config_format -t --head=src/HEAD.html -o dist/index.html project && opn dist/index.html
scripts.build-win: gulp build && tweego -f %npm_package_config_format% --head=src/HEAD.html -o dist/index.html project && opn dist/index.html
scripts.testmode-win: gulp build && tweego -f %npm_package_config_format% -t --head=src/HEAD.html -o dist/index.html project && opn dist/index.html

author: Chapel
